Header: Girl missing from Children's Home in Galle
Content: A 13-year-old girl who was given shelter at the Kithulampitiya Children's Home in Galle is reported missing. The girl was a resident of Bataatha South, Hungama. She was sent to this Home in 2016 after it was found that she was allegedly abused by her father. The patrons of the Kithulampitiya Children's Home have lodged a complaint with Galle Police after the teenage girl did not return after school on 26th of last month.
